description: Percentage of households deprived in education. A household is classified as deprived in education if no one has at least a level 2 education and no one aged 16 to 18 years is a full-time student.

Percentage of households deprived in employment. A household is classified as deprived in employment if any member, not a full-time student, is either unemployed or economically inactive due to long-term sickness or disability.

Percentage of households deprived in health and disability. A household is classified as deprived in the health dimension if any person in the household has general health that is bad or very bad or is identified as disabled.

Percentage of households deprived in housing. A household is classified as deprived in the housing dimension if the household's accommodation is either overcrowded, in a shared dwelling, or has no central heating.
